thesis.description: Barrow is the most northern First-Order Weather Station operated by the U.S. Weather Bureau. Much of the data that will be mentioned here has been taken from the "Local Climatological Data" for this station. Normal values are based upon the period of 1921-1950. These forms are published monthly by the U.S. Department of Commerce, Weather Bureau.
thesis.creator: Shellabear, William. H.
thesis.subject: Geography.
thesis.title: Evapotranspiration at Point Barrow, Alaska, summer 1956.
